Skullface

helmet (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 190
armor id [armor]: 228 (Skullface)
protection, head [prothead]: 18
defence [def]: -1
magic bonus [boosters]: +D
spell [itemspell]: #920 Horde of Skeletons
leadership (undead) [ldr-u]: +10

Requires 40D to forge (D5)

This helmet is made out of a human skull and enchanted with black magic. The helmet increases the wearer's skill in Death magic and enables him to animate skeletons during battle.
